Items.Name: Anhui Conch Information Technology Engineering Co Ltd
Animex AB
Items.Description:
Animex has long experience of automating the Swedish manufacturing industry with the help of 6-axis robots and integration of other equipment. Our main focus is on the plastics industry. We analyze the whole, processes, needs and design automation solutions that streamline production and increase profitability.

We like challenges and are happy to take on the task of creating unique and customized automation solutions for both small and large products. Our solutions are based on standardized products and proven concepts that generate flexibility with high availability. We listen carefully to our customers and understand that sometimes the solution needs to be completely adapted to a specific need. We use equipment and components of recognized high quality products.

Items.Name: Apex Automation & Robotics Pty Ltd
Items.Description:
Apex Automation and Robotics is an Australian company specialising in the 
design and manufacture of factory automation machines and robotic systems. 
Typical systems
• Robotic packing / palletising
• Robots with vision system or laser scanner
• Robots loading press or machining centre  
• Welding robots
Industry sectors
• Plastics
• Metal manufacturing
• Consumer products
• Foods

Whether you want to automate an entire plant or improve a section of your 
manufacturing process, Apex Automation and Robotics have the expertise to 
provide you with an economical automation solution using the latest 
technologies.

Items.Name: Applied Instrumentation Ltd
Items.Description: Applied Instrumentation Ltd was established in 2000. We are the company that providing professional knowledge and solution of process control instrumentation. We based in Hong Kong, and targeting customers in Hong Kong with excellence service and prompt response. Process control instrumentation supplied by the company includes Electromagnetic Flowmeter, Vortex, Swirl, Mass flowmeter, Pressure, temperature, level transmitter, water analyser of pH, dissolved oxygen, conductivity, turbitity, etc. Key customers in Hong Kong include, Hong Kong Water Supplies Department, Drainage Service Department, EMDS, Hong Kong CLP Power, Hong Kong Electric, Hong Kong Town Gas, etc. The company was sale agent of ABB Instrumentation since it established in 2000, and we have great knowledge of its products. We believe that with our expertise of process control instrumentation, we can serve great here in Hong Kong.

Items.Name: Applied Robotics International Pty Ltd
Items.Description:
Applied Robotics has been building special purpose automation machine systems 
for some 20 years now and have to date installed well over 350 systems 
worldwide. All of these are full turnkey systems – engineered from concept 
through mechanical design, electrical controls and software, and built, 
installed and commissioned by our own engineering team.

Our clients appreciate this full in-house capability as it means they always 
have instant and first priority access to both the mechanical and software 
engineers who designed the system should problems or the need for modifications 
for product variations arise over time.

Items.Name: Aproco B.V.
Items.Description:
Aproco delivers high-quality electrotechnical products focused on drive technology, premium brands that meet international standards.
Our products mainly find their way to mechanical engineering, maritime applications, medium and heavy industry.
We are known for our clear agreements, fast information and delivery reliability.
Aproco knows the tricks of the international trade and distributes only products from reputable manufacturers.

Our knowledge helps companies in various markets where an improved automation leads to an improved efficiency such as food and automotive industries.

Items.Name: Astech Projects Ltd
Items.Description:
Established in 1995, Astech Projects are an award winning Engineering and 
Science based company supplying robotic and automation solutions to a global 
customer base.

Astech specialise in the custom design, build and systems integration of 
robotics and automation applications for advanced manufacturing and regulated 
industries including pharmaceutical, medical device, consumer healthcare, 
petro-chemical and chemical.

Astech’s mission is to provide ‘best in class’ automation solutions tailored to 
customer’s unique and individual requirements. Our team of dedicated and 
talented engineers achieve this by delivering innovative and intelligent design 
solutions.

All design, manufacturing, software development and testing activities are 
undertaken at our specialist facility in Cheshire, UK, by dedicated groups 
specialising in Laboratory and Industrial Automation. From here systems are 
shipped, installed and maintained World Wide. 

Astech provide a full project life-cycle “From Concept to Completion” and offer 
a comprehensive system support service called REACTS® providing peace of mind 
for the lifetime of the system. We hold ISO-9001 and TickIT accreditation and 
undergo regular customer and third party quality audits.

Address.StreetAddress: Jl. Raya Jakarta Bogor Km. 47.3, Cibinong

Items.Name: Atelier Belge De La Manutention
Items.Description:
ABM a été créé début 1993. 

Dès le départ, l’orientation prise a été :
- des produits de qualité
- des solutions à la carte 
- une très grande réactivité
- choix de partenaires possédant un service technique compétent et investissant 
dans la   recherche et le développement
En 1993, le chiffre d’affaire d’ABM atteignait 100.000 € réalisé par une 
personne.
Depuis, chaque année, nous connaissons une croissance importante mais 
volontairement limitée pour en arriver treize ans après à un chiffre de 
4.500.000 € et un effectif de 25 personnes.
Cette progression est due à une équipe performante, dynamique et ouverte à une 
adaptation permanente nécessaire pour maintenir notre niveau de service face à 
une activité toujours plus soutenue.
Aujourd’hui, ABM est reconnu comme un acteur des plus efficaces et dynamiques 
dans le monde de la transmission de puissance, motorisation et manutention. Et, 
si vous ne nous connaissez pas encore, après quelques consultations, vous vous 
en rendrez vite compte.
Notre volonté est d’offrir à notre clientèle un service complet autour des 
convoyeurs : diagnostic, relevé, étude, stockage adapté, fourniture et certains 
placements.
Pour nous, chaque contrat est spécifique car le besoin est différent. Et cette 
souplesse, peu savent l’offrir.

test

Items.Name: Atlas Industrial Systems
Items.Description:
Atlas Industrial Systems was established in 1951 as an electrical and instrument supplier to the commercial and industrial sector. The core business became more focused on the supply and installation of instrumentation and control systems. All products supplied are manufactured and comply with international standards.

 The company is certified to comply to ISO 9001:2000, also with a 
 NOSA 4 safety rating. Atlas Industrial Systems is a compliant level 3 BBBEE contributor.

Items.Name: Auser Oy
Items.Description:
Auser Oy was founded in 1993. The name Auser is short for automation service. Our automation services focus on providing expert services to industrial partners as a supplier for electricity and automation solutions. Our expertise is constantly improved through product training for our personnel.

Our team of seven have operated for over twenty years with perennially good financial results. Our business operations are healthy and stand on firm foundations.

Through our focus on improvement and excellence, we provide You, our customer, the best technical solutions. We will do our part in maintaining Your production equipment, giving you the time to further optimize your production.

Productivity through automation

Items.Name: AUSTRALIS ENGINEERING Pty Ltd
Items.Description:
Australis Engineering is a family owned, award winning materials handling equipment manufacturer. Established in 1983, Australis has since grown to be a leading supplier to manufacturing companies in Australian and international markets.

Australis firmly believes in the inherent strength of the Australian manufacturing industry. We are manufacturers ourselves and have been supporting other Australian manufacturers since our inception in 1983.  To demonstrate our commitment we are proud members of the Australian Packaging and Processing Machinery Association (APPMA).

Items.Name: Autecnia
Items.Description:
GRUPO AUTECNIA, con sede central en Gijón (España), es un grupo altamente especializado, con amplia experiencia en la ejecución de proyectos integrales de automatización, software industrial, e ingeniería eléctrica.

Nuestros orígenes se sitúan a finales de los años 80, con el nacimiento de RYSEL AUTOMATIZACION Y CONTROL, en aquellos momentos como una pequeña empresa dedicada a la venta de material eléctrico, pero donde ya entonces se realizaban integraciones y programaciones de sistemas. De ahí nace todo, ese es nuestro origen.

La experiencia acumulada por nuestros profesionales en años de proyectos nos permite aportar soluciones con precisión, con la calidad requerida, muy competitivas, y eso hace ahora al GRUPO AUTECNIA una empresa solvente y con sólidos fundamentos para afrontar el futuro

Items.Name: AUTOCONTROL DEL GOLFO S.A. DE C.V.
Items.Description:
Autocontrol Del Golfo es una empresa mexicana, creada con la firme entereza de brindar y ofertar productos de calidad mundial; mismos que son necesarios en su empresa. ADG cuenta con personal altamente capacitado, el cual esta orientado al apoyo inmediato cuando usted lo requiera.
Empresa dedicada a los Servicios de Ingeniería, Suministro e Instalación, de Instrumentos de Medición y Control Industrial (Soluciones Integrales).
Fundada en el año del 2005, para apoyo en los servicios de Instalación de equipos de diversas empresas fabricantes de Instrumentos y control Industrial pero con actividades propias a partir del año 2012, hasta la fecha.
Tenemos una amplia gama de equipos de instrumentación y control industrial. Así como también a las soluciones integrales que le ofrecemos como una empresa a sus requerimientos de medición y control de variables de procesos industriales.

Items.Name: Automation Industrial Group LLC
Items.Description: Automation IG helps our customers improve their safety, ergonomics, efficiency, quality and capacity.  Our in-houseteam of experienced electrical engineers, mechanical engineers, machinists,electricians, robot technicians, and skilled assembly technicians ready to design, build and support your project.

Items.Name: Automation Systems and Designs
Items.Description:
ASD is a professional organization of engineering and technical personnel from a wide variety of industrial backgrounds. The focus of the business is to address the needs of the "Industrial Automation Market".

ASD maintains its own fully-equipped workshop for analysis, cell design and prototypes. ASD brings complete mechanical, electrical and software engineering along with industrial design expertise to its project teams. We offer a complement of advanced products and services, plus extensive experience developing specialized equipment designed to improve our client's product quality and production performance.

Items.Name: AUTOMATION X CORP CORPORATE BILLING
Items.Description:
Automation-X is a proven solution provider. We have 13 stocking facilities across the United States to meet our customers immediate needs. Our team receives rigorous training in all product lines. We have successfully designed new site setup as well as integrating solutions into existing sites.
We believe in product support and training. Our locations are equipped with onsite training facilities and dedicated specialists. 

Remote inventory management
Trailers
New site design
Automation integration into existing sites
Onsite training facilities
Remote and virtual training
Stocking facilities across the United States
Remote and onsite product/software support
Dedicated solution architects within each office

Items.Name: Automationsteknik i Hassleholm Aktiebolag
Items.Description:
We take on everything from a small part of a project to a turnkey solution. System solutions using robots are often complex because every customer has individual requirements. We employ automated production and assembly lines where robots provide a flexible solution. The solutions we develop are based on our customers’ unique requirements. 

Our strength is that we are used to working in various industries, such as the woodworking, manufacturing and food industries, which creates synergy effects that are beneficial to our customers. We often incorporate vision systems into our systems to detect and position parts.

Items.Name: AutomatiX SAL
Items.Description:
AutomatiX is a system integration firm founded in Lebanon, focused to provide innovative solutions in the field of automation and power and serving the Middle East, Gulf and Africa.

AutomatiX solutions cover the SCADA Systems, Distributed and Centralized Control System, Building Management Systems and Power Systems. The implemented systems serve the oil & gas, pharmaceutical, water and waste water, telecommunication, industrial processes and more…

Automatix enable customers to achieve their business objectives by providing innovative environment-friendly solutions, with quality products, to add value to our customer business, with the best-in-class technology and support services

Items.Name: Automatyka Pomiary Sterowanie S.A.
Items.Description:
W ciągu 20 lat dzięki unikalnej strategii i ciągłemu poszerzaniu oferty o 
innowacyjne usługi z dziedziny automatyki przemysłowej i elektryki, APS stała 
się jednym z krajowych liderów w tych branżach.

Od początku swojego istnienia firma kładła szczególny nacisk na jakość, 
potwierdzoną certyfikatem ISO 9001, indywidualizm w podejściu do Klienta, 
perfekcję wykonania, a także szybkość i elastyczność działań.

Zaczynając od obsługi Elektrociepłowni Białystok S.A., która do dziś jest 
największym Klientem firmy, APS z roku na rok zdobywała nowe rynki, oferując 
coraz szerszy zakres usług. W ciągu 20 lat działalności powstała nowa siedziba 
Spółki, rozbudowaliśmy halę produkcyjno-montażową i biuro projektowe, co 
umożliwiło firmie wejście w kolejne, innowacyjne sektory działalności.

Obecnie APS, jako jeden z liderów na rynku, oferuje kompleksowe usługi oparte 
na najnowocześniejszych narzędziach projektowych, programistycznych i 
najnowocześniejszych rozwiązaniach technologicznych. Jesteśmy partnerem i 
dystrybutorem wielu znanych firm polskich jak i zagranicznych, oferując 
sprzedaż detaliczną oraz hurtową podzespołów i komponentów automatyki 
przemysłowej i elektryki. Jako pierwsza podlaska spółka zadebiutowaliśmy na 
alternatywnym parkiecie GPW – NewConnect, adresowanym do dynamicznych, 
innowacyjnych spółek.

Dziś możemy więc śmiało powiedzieć, że stworzyliśmy spółkę pracującą według 
światowych standardów, dysponujemy nowoczesną bazą, doskonałymi warunkami 
pracy, najnowocześniejszymi narzędziami projektowymi, programistycznymi i 
technicznymi. Ambicje i możliwości naszych pracowników potwierdzają otrzymywane 
przez nas referencje z wykonanych na światowym poziomie wdrożeń. Te, jak i 
wiele innych sukcesów motywuje nas do dalszej, jeszcze bardziej intensywnej 
pracy, stanowiącej inspirację do ciągłego poszukiwania nowych rozwiązań i 
stwarzania korzystnych warunków do wzajemnej współpracy.

Address.StreetAddress: G109, laxmi Narayan industrial estate udhna-sachin road

Items.Name: Avans Maskintillbehor AB
Items.Description:
Avans Maskintillbehör AB startades 1989 och är i dag 4 anställda.

Vi arbetar med reservdelar, service och underhåll till industrin.
Våra produkter är Rullningslager, Transmissioner, Tätningar, Kugg /Snäckväxlar, Domkrafter Elmotorer, Frekvensomriktare och Mjukstartare. 

Vi arbetar bara med leverantörer som tillhandahåller full teknisk support.

Naturligtvis når ni oss Dygnet runt, Året Runt.

Items.Name: Avantec Antriebs- und Pumpentechnik GmbH
Items.Description:
Avantec Antriebs- und Pumpentechnik GmbH hat sich als Tochter der in 1955 
gegründeten Muttergesellschaft Naebers Elektro Techniek zu einem führenden 
Partner auf dem Gebiet der Reparatur und Lieferung von Elektromotoren und 
Antrieben entwickelt. 
Anerkannt von vielen der führenden Automationsherstellern sind wir in der Lage, 
Produkte von ABB, Baldor, Baumuller, Bosch Contraves, Control Techniques, 
Electrocraft, Fanuc, Indramat, Isoflux, Kollmorgan, Lenze, Oemer, Pacific 
Scientific, Powertec, SEM, Servomat, Siemens und Vascat zu reparieren und zu 
warten.

Wir decken das gesamte Spektrum der Industrie ab. Zu den Spezialgebieten 
gehören Maschinenwerkzeuge, Kunststoffextrusion, Automobilindustrie, 
Druckindustrie, Verpackungsindustrie und Vergnügungsparks.

Mit unserem Europa-übergreifenden 24-Stunden-Lieferservice können wir eine 
schnelle und effiziente Reaktion gewährleisten. Für bestimmte Schlüsselprodukte 
sind Austauschmotoren und Antriebe erhältlich, um die Stillstandszeit weiter zu 
reduzieren. Alle unsere Dienstleistungen stehen 24-7 zur Verfügung.

Wenn wir ein Teil zur Reparatur erhalten, werden alle Details in unser 
computerisiertes Auftragsüberwachungssystem eingegeben. Nach der ersten 
Inspektion durch einen voll qualifizierten Ingenieur wird ein detailliertes 
Angebot erstellt und dem Kunden zugestellt. Nach Erhalt der Zahlung oder einer 
Auftragsbestätigung (je nach Kreditbedingungen und Vergangenheit) wird die 
Reparatur nach OEM-Spezifikationen durchgeführt. Das reparierte Teil wird dann 
auf die bevorzugte Weise an den Kunden zurückgeschickt.

Mit uns als Ihrem Spezialmotor- und Antriebs-Reparaturpartner haben Sie die 
Gewissheit, dass Sie mit einer nach VCA abgenommenen Firma Geschäfte machen, 
deren Fokus immer dem Kunden gilt.

Kontaktieren Sie uns unter der unten angegebenen Nummer, wenn Sie von einem der 
oben angegebenen Vorteile Gebrauch machen wollen. Als Alternative können Sie 
Ihre Anfrage per Email an 
e-mail: info@avantec-gmbh.de
schicken.
Tel: +49(0)241-1689800

Items.Name: AVT Industriteknik AB
Items.Description:
Vision
Our vision is to be the leading provider function in production as our 
customers see as their natural partners.

Business
AVT is based on a production technical knowledge to increase customer 
productivity by automating and streamlining production processes.

Target
Our goal is to become the leading provider function for the industry which 
means everything from feasibility studies, development, project management, 
consulting, design, construction, commissioning, renovation or manufacture of 
production equipment.

Items.Name: Avtomatizirovannie sistemi i kompleksy ZAO
Items.Description:
Automated Systems and Complexes CJSC (ASC) is one of Russia’s leading group of companies specializing in the field of automatic electric drive and industrial procees automation.
The company does not only deal with design, object-oriented products manufacture and commissioning but also has its own developments related to the following areas: high voltage converter equipment, industrial converters, electric transport systems and microprocessor control systems. Some of these developments were put into batch production.
ASC performs a full range of works from design to on-site commissioning.

All works are carried out in compliance with international electrotechnical standards.

Due to our long-term experience in different branches of industry we are capable of finding solutions for the most complicated tasks in the field of industrial automation.
Engineering and scientific potential allows for efficient use of engineering staff and carrying out experimental investigations at advanced level.
Qualified and experienced specialists will provide a full range of services in the field of drilling machinery and upgrading of drilling rig electrical equipment.
Our company has experience in implementing integrated projects as the main contractor and ensures execution of all on-site works.

Items.Name: Axelent Engineering AB
Items.Description:
Axelent Engineering AB is located in Gislaved, Småland, and is associated with manufacturing industry and innovative economic solutions. 
The company was started in 1972 and has since 2005 been a member in the worldwide Axelent-group. Using the qualified competence and a good customer understanding Axelent is able to provide solutions in area of automation and product development in order to increase the customer’s efficiency and profit.

The goal for Axelent is to become one of Sweden’s leading company in automation and product development for industrial customers.

Items.Description: Distributor Wholesaler

Items.Name: Batenburg IAS B.V.
Items.Description:
Since its foundation in 2005, IAS Industrial Automation has grown into an innovative company that specializes in the design and implementation of automation systems for industry and infrastructure technology. The company was founded by Ron de Bruijn, who previously worked for renowned companies such as Alfa Laval Automation/ABB, CIMSolutions and GTI/Cofely. Since 24 August 2015, IAS has been part of Batenburg Techniek.

In 2005, IAS started to focus on industrial automation. We realized that there was a gap in the market, especially in the food industry. A large part of our relations turned out not to have a good permanent automation party (anymore).

In 2006 we decided to develop IAS into a mature company because the market reacted very enthusiastically to our approach. It turned out that the in-depth knowledge of the systems and processes, the customer treatment and the delivered solutions set them apart from the competition, leading to the award of the “Certified Premium Partner” designation by ABB.

Partly due to the partnership with ABB, we have grown steadily, which has given us more and more opportunities in public tenders for projects at, among others, water boards. There too, it turned out that we were distinctive compared to our competitors. This distinction focuses in particular on the quality of the solutions we provide and the associated attention to the customer.

We are proud that many customers agree and act as ambassadors for our company.

We now have more than 20 professionals working for us and we expect that we will continue to grow. The scale in industry, the pressure on infrastructures and therefore the process complexity are still increasing, while the knowledge about process assurance and systems is only becoming scarcer.

Address.StreetAddress: Viale Galileo Snc - Nuova Zona Arti

Items.Name: BB Service Di Bruschi Fabio
Items.Description:
BBSERVICE è un'azienda consolidata, con alle spalle una quindicinale esperienza 
nel settore della vendita ed assistenza di pompe e motori elettrici, 
industriali e navali. 
BBSERVICE è certificata ISO 9001 (IT231265) questa certificazione è significato 
di massima espressione di garanzia di prodotti e servizi.

Items.Name: Beenen B.V.
Items.Description:
Beenen designs and realizes complete control systems for the industry, infrastructure and water technology sectors, regionally, nationally and internationally. After delivery, we transfer the care to the maintenance, support and inspection services. The basic conditions for each assignment are: continuity in the cooperation, delivering quality and standing for the agreements made.

Een man een man, een woord een woord! 

Almost a hundred years ago, the foundations were laid for today's Beenen Industrial Automation. Already at the beginning of the last century, Beenen focused on the electrical installations for the emerging dairy industry. By continuously investing in knowledge and new developments, we are experts in industrial technology. This involvement in combination with advancing insight forms the basis of current expertise as a system integrator and process installer.

With approximately 200 enthusiastic employees, spread over the Heerenveen, Zwolle and Nijkerk locations, we supply complete control systems to clients in the food/feed, water, infrastructure, chemical and mechanical engineering market segments.

Due to the specialist knowledge, the quality of the products and the customer involvement, Beenen has grown into a successful company in the field of Industrial Automation.

We are an efficient and reliable partner that strives for a sustainable relationship with our clients.

Address.StreetAddress: No. 23 Huixin East Street,4th floor, No. 4001-4025 Rooms, Chaoyang District

Items.Name: Beijing CNTEN Smart Technology Co Ltd
Items.Description: CNTEN was established in 2004, and it is a high-technology enterprise. ABB China and Beijing Xunteng intelligent technology co., LTD(CNTEN) jointly promote the development of industrial application combined with Beidou platform service, so that ABB's products and services in natural gas leak detection, instrumentation, process industry and other fields have Beidou industry application precision service platform capability.
